reviewText: i first saw this movie on TV and really enjoyed it and wanted to see it again. This is like the hottest movie i could never get sick of it! Its focused on three sets on characters and all the characters are trying to find weed or money to get some in Alberta.  If your thinking about seeing it do its hot movie.

50th Street Films, a division of Troma films, releases this almost Hollywood looking film about three groups of strangers who eventully have all their paths cross. If you enjoyed "Trainspotting", "Repo Man", or "Pulp Fiction", you might want to check this out. No gore. Little blood. Almost unTromanatic.
